Class ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends java.lang.Object

      • checkClosingSession

        public static int checkClosingSession(java.util.Calendar date,
                                      int session)
        ---------------------------Conditions------------------------------ /**------------------------------------------------------------------- Check reservation time is less than 30mins before session closing time
        Parameters:
        date - Date and time of the reservation
        session - Dining session: AM or PM
        Returns:
        0(< 30mins before closing time) or 1(> 30mins before closing time)

      • getReservationTimeSession

        public static int getReservationTimeSession(java.util.Calendar date)
        ------------------------------------------------------------------- Determine the session code
        Parameters:
        date - DateTime to determine the session code
        Returns:
        session code 0 = invalid session, 1 = AM Session, 2 = PM Session
